Name: John:Condemned
About the game: John: Condemned is a psychological horror game. John, a man trained from a very young age to be a murderer, is contacted for a final assignment. He will embark on a journey of uncertain destination and his only wish is to be able to return home. In an absolutely hostile environment and with even worse company... Will John be able to go all the way?
